articles.title: Tech Giants Face New Regulations
articles.author: Sarah Khan
articles.description: Governments around the world are introducing new laws to regulate big tech companies, focusing on data privacy and monopoly practices.
articles.content: Several countries are enforcing new regulations aimed at curbing the power of tech giants like Google, Meta, and Amazon. These include stricter data collection rules and fines for anti-competitive behavior.

articles.title: Pakistan Advances in Clean Energy Sector
articles.author: Ahmed Tariq
articles.description: Pakistan has launched multiple solar and wind power projects aimed at reducing reliance on fossil fuels.
articles.content: The Ministry of Energy reports that over 2,000 MW of renewable energy projects have been initiated. These are expected to reduce carbon emissions significantly by 2030.

articles.title: Record Rainfall Hits Karachi
articles.author: Mariam Jamil
articles.description: Heavy monsoon rains have caused major flooding in several parts of Karachi, disrupting transportation and power supply.
articles.content: According to the Met Office, Karachi received over 150mm of rain in 24 hours, the highest in a decade. Authorities are working to clear water from main roads.

articles.title: AI Takes Center Stage at Global Tech Summit
articles.author: Ali Raza
articles.description: Artificial Intelligence was the most discussed topic at this yearâ€™s Global Tech Summit, highlighting its impact on industries from healthcare to finance.
articles.content: Speakers emphasized responsible AI development, job automation, and ethical considerations in deploying machine learning models in real-world settings.
